globalProperty.description: Specifies the uuid of the person attribute type for mobile phone number
Specifies the uuid of the person attribute type for home phone number

Comma-separated list of mappings between OpenMRS patient identifier type uuids and system URIs (identifier type namespaces), should be of the form identifierTypeUuid-1^systemUri1,identifierTypeUuid-2^systemUri2. The system URI values MUST match the URI values defined for the respective patient identifier types in the OpenCR config file under the systems section. The system URI for the NID patient identifier typecL MUST also match the values used in the OpenCR PatientRelationship.json and decisionRules.json files.
Specifies the default value to be returned by the services
Specifies the client names to benefit from resources exposed by the application. The list has to be separated by ','. Ex: CLIENT_1,CLIENT_2
When set to true, the debezium engine will be started otherwise it will not be started
A required property that specifies the unique id of the database server.

An optional database username for the user account debezium should use to connect to the database to capture the changes if different from that of the OpenMRS user defined in the runtime properties file

An optional password for the user account debezium should use to connect to the database to capture the changes, you only need to set the value of this property if debezium.database.user has been specified
A required MySQL specific property that specifies the path to a file where the database history is stored
A required path to file where offsets are to be stored

An optional MySQL specific property that controls whether and how long the connector holds the global MySQL read lock, which prevents any updates to the database, while the connector is performing a snapshot, Possible settings are: minimal, minimal_percona, extended, none. The default is extended, for more detailed explanations of these values please refer to the official debezium documentation for the MySQL connector.

An optional MySQL specific property that specifies whether to use an encrypted connection. Possible settings are: disabled, preferred, required, verify_ca, verify_identity. The default is preferred, for more detailed explanations of these values please refer to the official debezium documentation for the MySQL connector.
